## inputs.Input.appendField() method

Add a field (or label from string), and all prefix and suffix fields, to the end of the input's field row.

**Signature:**

```typescript
appendField<T>(field: string | Field<T>, opt_name?: string): Input;
```

</td><td>

string \| [Field](./blockly.field_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

Something to add as a field.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this field again. Should be unique to the host block.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Input](./blockly.input_class.md)

The input being append to (to allow chaining).
